item.description:
Big Shot with Mike DelGuidice, featuring John Scarpulla on Sax -The Ultimate Billy Joel Experience will be performing many of Billy Joel's classic tunes along with songs from Journey, Sir Elton John, Sir Paul McCartney, The Beatles, Led Zepplin, Aerosmith, and many more. For more info on the event go to http://www.nbpotatofest.com/

Look for me with a "Meetup" sign at the entrance.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Party It Up With Big Shot At The North Branford Potato & Corn Festival
